translation.en: Hello, everybody. Thanks for coming.
I am the Lorax. I speak for the trees.
And I'd like to say a few words, if you please.
Regarding the story that you're about to see
it actually happened. Just take it from me.
But there's more to this story than what's on the page,
so please pay attention while I set the stage.
translation.ko: 무대를 준비할 동안 눈여겨 잘 보세요 "플라스틱 도시 스니드빌"

translation.en: We open in Thneedville, a city they say that was plastic and fake,
translation.ko: 이 얘기의 무대는 인공 플라스틱 도시 스니드빌입니다

translation.en: and they liked it that way!
A town without nature, not one living tree.
translation.ko: 나무 한 그루 없는 이 가짜 도시에

translation.en: So, what happened to them?
Cue the music! Let's see.
(ALL SINGING) In Thneedville, it's a brand new dawn
With brand new cars and houses and lawns
translation.ko: 자동차도 집도 잔디도 늘 새 거지

translation.en: Here in Got-all-that-we-need-ville
In Thneedville, we manufacture our trees
Each one is made in factories
And uses 96 batteries
In Thneedville, the air's not so clean
So we buy it fresh
It comes out this machine!
In Satisfaction's- guaranteed-ville
In Thneedville, we don't want to know
Where the smog and trash and chemicals go
I just went swimming, and now I glow
In Thneedville, we have fun year round
We surf and snowboard right in town
We thank the Lord for all we've got
translation.ko: 우린 이 모든 걸 신께 감사해

translation.en: Including this brand new parking lot!
Parking lot!
Parking lot!
Oh, look, it's Aloysius O'Hare
Aloysius O'Hare
The man who found a way to sell air
And became a zillionaire
Hip-hip-hooray!
In Thneedville, we love living this way
It's like living in paradise
It's perfect! And that's how it will stay
Oh, yeah!
Here in Love-the-life-we-lead-ville
translation.ko: 오, 예! 여긴 행복한 스니드빌 풍요의 스니드빌

translation.en: Destined-to-succeed-ville
We-are-all-agreed-ville
We love it here in...
Thneedville!
Yes!
Oh, hey, Audrey. Hi.
Did your ball land in my backyard again?
What? No.
A model airplane, this time.
Hey, do you want to see something cool?
Come on.
Whoa!
Did you...
Did you paint this?
Do you like it? What?
Are you kidding? This is amazing!
What are those?
Those are trees. Real ones.
They used to grow all around here.
And people said that the touch of their tufts
was softer than anything, even silk.
And they smelled like butterfly milk!
Wow! What does that even mean?
translation.ko: 와! 그게 무슨 말인지도 잘 모르겠다

translation.en: I know, right?
Oh, yeah.
What I want more than anything in the whole world is to see
translation.ko: 내 소원은 진짜 나무를 보는 거야

translation.en: a real living tree growing in my backyard.
translation.ko: 나무가 우리 마당에서 자라는 걸 보고 싶어

translation.en: So if, say... I'm just thinking out loud here.
If a guy somehow got you one...
I'd probably marry him on the spot.
I bet that sounds crazy. Does that sound crazy?
No! Not crazy. (CLEARS THROAT)
Not crazy at all.
Ted, honey, don't play with your food.
translation.ko: 테드, 먹을 거 갖고 장난하지 마

translation.en: You, either, Mom.
So, Mom, do you happen to know if there's any place
translation.ko: 저기요, 엄마 살아있는 나무를 구할 만한 곳이

translation.en: where I could get a real tree?
Ted, we already have a tree. It's the latest model.
translation.ko: 우리 나무 있잖니 그것도 최신 모델로!

translation.en: Yeah, but I mean a real one
that grows out of the ground or whatever.
You know, a real tree.
Really?
You would rather have some dirty, messy
lump of wood that just sticks out of the ground?
And it does what? I don't even know what it does. What's its purpose?
Look at what we've got.
It's the Oak-amatic. The only tree with its own remote.
Summer, autumn, winter,
and disco! (DISCO MUSIC PLAYING)
Mom? Come on, Ted. Get into it. Dance with the tree.
translation.ko: - 엄마? - 뭐 해, 너도 같이 춰봐

translation.en: Oh, it hurts, Mom. Please stop. (MUSIC STOPS)
So, anyway...
Let's just say I need a tree. Where would I go? What do I do?
Then you know what? You need to find the Once-ler.
(STAMMERS) The what?
translation.ko: 누구요? 엄마, 그런 황당한 옛날 얘긴 제발 좀 그만해요

translation.en: Mom, it's not really the time for one of your magical fables, okay?
translation.ko: 엄마, 그런 황당한 옛날 얘긴 제발 좀 그만해요

translation.en: (LAUGHS) That's right, I forgot.
I'm old and can't even remember to put my teeth in.
translation.ko: 다 늙어서 틀니도 빼먹고 다니는 주제에…

translation.en: Stand down. That's not what I meant.
No, really, I forgot my teeth.
Would you be a dear and go get them for me?
(SIGHS) Sure, Mom.
Okay, here's the deal.
The Once-ler is the man who knows what happened to the trees.
translation.ko: 원슬러는 나무가 사라진 이유를 알고 있어

translation.en: You want one, you need to find him.
The Once-ler? Mmm-hmm.
Okay. Grammy, is this a real thing that we're talking about now?
translation.ko: 할머니, 방금 하신 그 말 사실이에요?

translation.en: Oh, he's real all right.
Well, where can I find him?
Far outside of town where the grass never grows
translation.ko: 이 도시 밖 어딘가 풀 한 포기 나지 않고 바람에선 시큼한 악취가 풍기는 곳

translation.en: and the wind smells slow and sour when it blows.
And no birds ever sing, excepting old crows.
translation.ko: 거기선 새도 울지 않지 늙은 까마귀 말고는…

translation.en: Quit doing that.
That's the place where the Once-ler lives.
Wait, outside of town?
People used to say if you brought him 15 cents,
a nail
and the shell of a great, great, great grandfather snail,
he would tell you everything.
Mr. O'Hare, what we've got for you
is something that is going to take O'Hare Air
to the next level.
Now, Mr. O'Hare, I know what you're thinking.
One, "I've gotten rich selling people air that's "fresher than the stinky stuff outside."
translation.ko: 첫째, 난 밖의 공기보다 훨씬 신선한 공기를 팔아 부자가 됐다

translation.en: Two, and here is the important one, "How can I possibly make even more money?"
translation.ko: 둘째, 이게 중요한데요 어떻게 하면 돈을 더 벌까?

translation.en: We can tell you, sir! We can tell you.
Check out this commercial, huh?
Well, here goes another lame Saturday.
Dude, I don't think so!
Man!
What!
COMMENTATOR: O'Hare purified air. Freshness to go. Please breathe responsibly. Ah?
translation.ko: 신선한 오헤어 휴대용 공기 아무 공기나 마시지 마세요

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. Yeah! Love it.
You got to be kidding me.
You really think people are stupid enough to buy this?
translation.ko: 사람들이 이런 광고에 넘어갈 거 같아?

translation.en: Our research shows that if you put something in a plastic bottle, people will buy it.
translation.ko: 연구 결과, 플라스틱병에 든 건 다 팔리게 돼 있어요

translation.en: Exactly. And...
And what's more, when we build a new factory to make the plastic bottles,
the air quality is just going to get worse.
Which will make people want our air even more, and drive sales where?
translation.ko: 그럼 우리 공기 매출도 올라가죠, 어디까지?

translation.en: Through the roof!
So, in other words, the more smog in the sky,
the more people will buy.
See, that's why he's the genius! It even rhymes!
I'm aware it rhymes.
What do you two knuckleheads want? I'm in the middle of a meeting!
What?
Why is he leaving town?
No one ever leaves town!
See what he's up to.
Huh?
Oh, man.
All right.
Okay.
Who are you?
Who are you and what are you doing here?
I'm Ted. I'm Ted.
I can't breathe. Are you the Once-ler?
Oh, man. Didn't you read the signs?
No one is supposed to come here.
Get out of here and leave me alone!
And don't let the boot hit you on the way out.
The boot?
Hello!
Listen! People say that if someone brings you this stuff
that you will tell them about trees.
No, no, no!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 안 돼, 안 돼

translation.en: Trees?
Yeah, real ones.
You know, that grow out of the ground?
Hello?
Sorry, it's just... Well, I didn't think anyone still cared about trees.
translation.ko: 미안하다, 아직도 나무에 관심 있는 사람이 있는 줄 몰랐어

translation.en: Well, that's me. The guy who still cares. I'm here.
translation.ko: 난 나무에 관심이 있어요 그래서 왔어요

translation.en: Do you want to know about trees? About what happened to them?
translation.ko: 알고 싶냐? 나무한테 무슨 일이 있었는지

translation.en: Why they're all gone? It's because of me.
Wait, what?
It's because of me! (COUGHS)
And my invention, the Thneed.
It was an amazing product that could do the job of a thousand.
translation.ko: 스니드는 수천 명 몫을 하는 놀라운 제품이었어

translation.en: All right. Sounds ridiculous, but I mean, that's cool.
You're darn right it was cool!
It all started a long time ago.
Can we start not so long ago, maybe?
Do you want a tree?
Yes, yes.
Then it all started a long, long time ago.
translation.ko: 그럼 그 오래전 얘기부터 전부 들어야 돼

translation.en: I was a young man leaving home.
Well, here I go, Mom. Off to change the world with my Thneed.
translation.ko: 저 가요, 엄마 내 스니드로 세상을 바꿀 거예요

translation.en: I'm actually doing it!
Yes, but just remember, Oncie,
if somehow your invention ends up a failure instead of a success,
translation.ko: 네 발명품이 성공 못 하고 혹시 실패해도…

translation.en: oh, it wouldn't surprise me at all! (ALL LAUGHING)
Nice wheels.
Burn!
Yeah, "Burn!"
But you will see, okay? I'm going to prove you all wrong.
translation.ko: 내가 옳았다는 걸 곧 알게 될 거야

translation.en: Come on, Melvin!
So, there I was at the very bottom.
With nothing but a wagon, a mule,
and a completely irrational sense of optimism.
I was searching the globe,
obsessed with finding the perfect material for my Thneed.
translation.ko: 완벽한 재료를 찾으려고 난 온 세상을 돌아다녔지

translation.en: But I'd had absolutely no success.
Until one day, I found paradise. (NEIGHS) Oh!
translation.ko: 그러던 어느 날 난 낙원을 발견했지

translation.en: We're going to be there soon, I'm sure.
Whoa!
This is the most beautiful place,
okay, I have ever seen.
Ta-da!
Whoa!
(SINGING) This is it
This is the place
These Truffula trees are just what I need
translation.ko: 이 트러풀라 나무는 바로 내가 찾던 것

translation.en: Gonna chop one down and make my Thneed
But first...
(SINGS TUNE)
Now you!
translation.ko: 나, 나, 나, 나 여러분 차례!

translation.en: (ALL SING TUNE)
That's great!
So now our friendship can begin
Hand in hand, and wing and fin
There's nothing you and I can't do
So let's all make my dreams come true
Hey, guys!
Come on, where is my back-up chorus?
translation.ko: 노래 안 해? 백 코러스 어디 갔어?

translation.en: What?
Ah-ha! Oh.
TED: Hey, hey, wait. Wait a minute.
Excuse me?
Yeah, that's awesome.
Feeding junk food to forest animals? That's great.
But, uh, is there a musical number where you show me how to get a tree?
translation.ko: 나무를 찾을 단서가 들어있는 노래는 없나요?

translation.en: Because I would love to hear that one.
Oh, yes. Right after the musical number about the kid
who kept interrupting the story, and was never heard from again.
translation.ko: 쫓겨난 녀석에 관한 노래가 뒤에 나와

translation.en: Right, got it. Proceed.
All right, here we go.
About to make a Thneed, about to change the world.
Check it out, guys...
Where did everybody go?
Little did I know that by chopping down that tree
translation.ko: 그때 난 몰랐어 그 나무를 벤 순간

translation.en: I had just summoned a mystical creature as old as time itself.
translation.ko: 난 우주만큼 오래된 신비의 존재를 불러낸 거야

translation.en: The legendary, slightly annoying
guardian of the forest.
The Lorax.
(WHISTLING)
Hey! Whoo!
Did you chop down this tree?
Uh... No.
Who did it?
(GASPS) What's that?
I think he did it.
Leave! Vacate the premises! Take your ax and get out!
translation.ko: 당장 여기서 꺼져! 도끼 들고 꺼지라고!

translation.en: And who are you?
I'm the Lorax! Guardian of the forest.
I speak for the trees.
So you're telling me, you just didn't see me magically appear out of that stump?
translation.ko: 내가 이 나뭇등걸에서 마법처럼 나타나는 걸 못 봤나?

translation.en: With all the lightning and thunder and stuff. You didn't see any of that?
translation.ko: 천둥, 번개도 막 쳤는데 못 봤어?

translation.en: No, but that sounds amazing. Can I see some of that?
Uh, yeah, I could show you. But that's not how it works.
translation.ko: 보여줄 순 있지만 그건 규칙에 어긋나

translation.en: Okay. Um...
Didn't really happen.
Oh, I know what you want!
I've got one of these for the cutest little guy I ever saw!
translation.ko: 내가 선물을 줄게 세상에서 제일 귀여운 땅딸보 아저씨!

translation.en: Yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy...
How dare you! Give me that!
I'm going to eat this,
but I am highly offended by it.
What are you... Hey, Mustache! Will you stop that?
translation.ko: 뭐 하는…? 이봐, 콧수염 그만하지 못해?

translation.en: What's your deal, man?
Time for you to go, Beanpole! Pull them right out.
Just going to put them right back in. We can do this all day.
Stop right there! Stop it!
So you would hammer one of nature's innocent creatures?
translation.ko: 지금, 고귀한 자연의 창조물에 망치질을 하는 건가?

translation.en: What? No! I would never hit this little guy. You, on the other hand,
translation.ko: 아냐, 난 쟬 망치질할 생각 없어! 하지만 당신은

translation.en: I would gladly pound you and your mustache into the ground!
Behold! The intruder and his violent ways.
translation.ko: 모두 봤지? 이 무례한 침입자의 난폭함을!

translation.en: Shame on you. For shame!
translation.ko: 부끄러운 줄 알아 부끄러운 줄 알라고!

translation.en: All right, you know what? That's it!
You listen to me, you furry meatloaf.
I'm going to chop down as many trees as I need. Okay?
translation.ko: 이 나무 몽땅 다 벨 거야

translation.en: Newsflash! Not going anywhere!
translation.ko: 난 절대 아무 데도 안 가

translation.en: End of story.
Then you leave me no choice.
If you're not gone by the time the sun sets on this valley,
translation.ko: 이 계곡에 해가 질 때까지 안 떠나면

translation.en: all the forces of nature will be unleashed upon you
translation.ko: 대자연의 모든 저주가 너한테 내릴 것이다

translation.en: and curse you until the end of your days!
You have been warned.
Thanks. Yeah, okay.
You have been warned.
But I didn't listen to his warning.
And you won't believe what happened that night.
What?
translation.ko: 그날 밤 놀라운 일이 일어났어 네?

translation.en: If you want to hear more, come back tomorrow.
translation.ko: 더 듣고 싶으면 내일 다시 와

translation.en: Hey, wait, wait! Tomorrow?
translation.ko: 더 듣고 싶으면 내일 다시 와 잠깐만요, 내일요?

translation.en: Whoa!
Are you serious right now?
Ah! You live in the middle of nowhere!
translation.ko: 지금 농담해요? 이 외딴곳엘 또 와요?

translation.en: It stinks out here. Don't make me come back!
translation.ko: 이 더러운 곳에? 난 못 와요!

translation.en: I guess you don't really want to hear the rest of the story. (SCREAMS)
No, no.
I do. I really do. I want to hear the story. I just...
Nah! You don't have what it takes. Goodbye.
translation.ko: 아냐, 넌 자격이 없어 잘 가!

translation.en: Wait, wait! I have what it takes.
It's all right. It's okay, I'll come back. It's no problem.
See, here I am, leaving. Walking away now.
I'll see you tomorrow.
Maybe. Just maybe.
(CHEERING)
What did you wish for, Audrey?
Well, I would love to tell you,
but, sadly, according to the universal wish laws, I cannot. (CHUCKLES)
TED: I know what she wished for.
Was it, perhaps...
This?
Ted, you didn't.
Oh, no. I totally did.
Happy birthday, Audrey.
Kiss him! Kiss him! (CHUCKLES)
MRS. WIGGINS: Ted.
Ted. Tedster. Huh!
You're kissing the cereal again, hon. What?
translation.ko: - 왜 또 시리얼 통에 키스해? - 내가 뭘요?

translation.en: I just... I like this cereal. What one is this? Yeah!
translation.ko: 이 시리얼이 좋아서 그래요 뭔 맛이더라?

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ko: 이 시리얼이 좋아서 그래요 뭔 맛이더라? 그래…

translation.en: Well, I'll make sure to buy extra next time for you.
All right, cool. Hey, I got to run. I got to go do a thing.
So, I'll see you guys.
translation.ko: 그만 나가볼게요 할 일이 있어요 이따 봐요

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
You're not going anywhere, young man.
(SIGHS) It's Sunday. You know what that means?
Family time, and we're all playing board games!
But...
translation.ko: 가족의 날이야 보드게임 하는 날! 하지만…

translation.en: Oh, man.
Mom, seriously, every turn?
Hey, back off!
Ooh!
No. Okay! Family time is over.
translation.ko: 오! 이런… 좋아요! 가족의 시간 끝!

translation.en: It is now personal time. I'll be in my room.
Okay, dear. Have fun.
I knew I could break her.
Go see him!
Oh, yeah!
You rule! Thank you, Grammy.
Hey! Ted, right?
Um, Mr. O'Hare?
So, I hear you have become interested in trees.
What's that all about?
Where did you hear that? (CHUCKLES) Oh.
Teddy, there's not much that goes on in Thneedville that I don't know about.
Here's the deal, I make a living selling fresh air to people.
translation.ko: 난 신선한 공기를 돈 받고 팔아먹지만

translation.en: Trees? They make it for free.
So, when I hear people talking about them,
I consider it kind of a threat to my business.
translation.ko: 난 내 사업에 대한 위협으로 느껴

translation.en: I don't even know what you're talking about.
You listen to me, boy.
Don't go poking around in things you don't understand
translation.ko: 알지도 못하는 일에 괜히 끼어들지 마

translation.en: or I'll be your worst nightmare.
I'm Frankenstein's head on a spider's body!
translation.ko: 난 프랑켄슈타인의 머리에 거미의 몸을 가졌어!

translation.en: Yeah, um...
Okay, my mom is expecting me. So, I'm just going to...
Of course, of course. Now, go back to your family game time.
translation.ko: 그래, 가봐 가족과 즐겁게 게임이나 해

translation.en: Grandma just finished her turn.
Please. I have eyes everywhere.
translation.ko: 왜 이래? 난 사방에 눈이 있어

translation.en: You got a beautiful town here, Ted.
Lots of fun stuff to occupy your short attention span.
translation.ko: 네가 싫증 안 내고 놀 거리가 널렸어

translation.en: Why, I can't think of any reason
you would ever want to go outside of town again.
translation.ko: 도시 밖으로 또 나갈 생각을 하진 않겠지?

translation.en: Okay! Good talk. Really good talk.
(PANTING)
Look out!
Hey, man? You know, you need to change that door bell.
Oh, you missed me. What?
You're already back. Clearly, you missed me a little. Right?
translation.ko: 벌써 온 걸 보니 내가 보고 싶었어, 조금은… 그렇지?

translation.en: No, I didn't. I'm just here to hear the end of the story.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 그냥 남은 얘길 들으러 온 거예요

translation.en: Why are you so interested in trees anyway? Why aren't you like other kids,
translation.ko: 왜 나무에 관심을 갖지? 대체 왜

translation.en: break dancing and wearing bell-bottoms, and playing the Donkey Kongs?
translation.ko: 딴 애들처럼 나팔바지 입고 스카이 콩콩이나 타지 않고?

translation.en: (LAUGHS) Yeah, right, right. I don't know.
Uh, I just thought it would be kind of cool to have one, you know? Huh?
translation.ko: 그냥 나무 한 그루 있으면 멋질 거 같아서요

translation.en: It's a girl, isn't it?
What? No!
Really? Because when a guy does something stupid once,
translation.ko: 정말? 남잔 바보짓을 다들 한 번쯤 하지

translation.en: well, that's because he's a guy.
translation.ko: 남잔 바보짓을 다들 한 번쯤 하지

translation.en: But if he does the same stupid thing twice,
translation.ko: 하지만 바보짓을 두 번 하는 건

translation.en: it's usually to impress some girl.
translation.ko: 하지만 바보짓을 두 번 하는 건 보통 계집애 때문이야

translation.en: Hey, she is not some girl!
translation.ko: 보통 계집애 때문이야 그냥 계집애가 아니에요!

translation.en: She's a woman, in high school.
translation.ko: 그냥 계집애가 아니에요! 고등학교 다니는 숙녀라고요

translation.en: And she loves trees. And I'm going to get her one. Aw!
How nice to see someone so undeterred by things like reality. Thank you.
translation.ko: 오랜만에 현실 감각 없는 녀석을 보니 반갑네

translation.en: All right, but where did we leave off?
Now that's a Thneed.
Nothing unmanly about knitting. No, sir.
Oh!
Who taught you guys how to steal a bed?
Okay, nice and easy. (SNORING)
Nice work, you guys. Couldn't have done it without you.
(LAUGHS)
You got to be kidding me. Can he swim?
Of course he can't swim!
translation.ko: 헤엄칠 줄 알까? 당연히 못 치겠지!

translation.en: Hang on, Pipsqueak! I'm coming to get you!
translation.ko: 당연히 못 치겠지! 꽉 잡아, 핍스퀵! 구해줄게!

translation.en: Hey, you fishies! Stop that bed!
Jump, jump!
Come on, get up there. Come on.
Go, go! A little bit more! A little bit more!
Get up there.
Okay, Pipsqueak, give me your hand. Come on, reach out for the Lorax.
translation.ko: 핍스퀵, 날 잡아! 내 손을 잡아!

translation.en: (HUMMING)
Hey, Beanpole, wake up!
What's happening? Where am I?
Hey! We got trouble, and it's coming up fast!
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거야, 여긴 어디지? 이봐, 큰일 났어! 물살이 엄청 빨라!

translation.en: We're in a river!
Help is on the way!
No, no!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 안 돼, 안 돼!

translation.en: (GRUNTING)
(EXHALING) Yuck!
Ah!
I was heading into the light, and you pulled me right back and here I am! You saved my life!
Yeah, I know. Well, no, it's not that big a deal.
It is a big deal!
Look, I almost went over that waterfall! Wait...
translation.ko: 대단하지 폭포 밑으로 떨어질 뻔했다고! 잠깐만…

translation.en: On my bed. How did my bed get in the river?
translation.ko: 내 침대가 왜 강 위에 있었지?

translation.en: Uh... About that...
translation.ko: 내 침대가 왜 강 위에 있었지? 그게 말이야…

translation.en: Actually... I put your bed in the water.
I just wanted to calmly float you away.
translation.ko: 해치려던 건 아냐 자넬 그냥 보내고 싶었어

translation.en: Look, everyone here needs the trees
translation.ko: 자넬 그냥 보내고 싶었어 이들 모두 나무가 필요한데

translation.en: and you're chopping them down!
So, we've got a big problem.
translation.ko: 자네가 다 베잖아! 그래서 우린 큰 곤경에 처했다고!

translation.en: I hereby swear that I will never chop down another tree.
translation.ko: 알았어 맹세할게 다신 나무를 베지 않을게

translation.en: I promise.
Thank you. But I'm going to keep my eye on you.
translation.ko: 고맙네, 하지만 내가 자넬 지켜볼 거야

translation.en: Good. Now, I've got a big day tomorrow
translation.ko: 고맙네, 하지만 내가 자넬 지켜볼 거야 좋아

translation.en: so I'm going to get some sleep.
translation.ko: 내일 할 일이 많아서 난 좀 자야겠어

translation.en: Right after I find my bed. (ELECTRICITY CRACKLING)
Okay, what are you...
Question, what are they doing here?
And follow up, if I may, what are you doing here?
translation.ko: 그리고, 당신은 또 왜 여기 있는 건데?

translation.en: Well, after the incident last night,
we found one of your socks and came here to return it.
translation.ko: 어젯밤의 그 난리 통에 자네 양말 한 짝이 떨어졌길래

translation.en: But when we got here, you were asleep. What?
translation.ko: 자네 양말 한 짝이 떨어졌길래 돌려주러 왔더니 자길래…

translation.en: Ew!
Exactly. And sleeping is the body's way of telling other people to go away.
translation.ko: 잔다는 건, 외부인은 꺼져달라는 몸의 언어야

translation.en: I know, but you looked so cozy.
translation.ko: 잔다는 건, 외부인은 꺼져달라는 몸의 언어야 알지만 너무 아늑해 보였어

translation.en: And it was cold outside, and we just fell asleep. No harm done.
translation.ko: 알지만 너무 아늑해 보였어 밖은 춥고… 그래서 잠이 들었어

translation.en: "No harm done"? "No harm done"? Okay.
translation.ko: 피해는 없잖아 피해가 없다고? 피해가 없어? 맙소사

translation.en: Okay, I put my lips on those. Well, I used to, anyway. (GRUNTING)
translation.ko: 그거 내 입 닿은 건데… 이젠 네가 써라

translation.en: Did you just... In my bowl!
You don't even have a mustache.
translation.ko: 이걸 왜 갖고 있나? 자넨 수염도 없잖아

translation.en: What? I thought we made a deal last night.
translation.ko: 더 이상은 못 참겠어! 뭘? 어제 협상했잖아

translation.en: Yes, we did.
And I said I wouldn't chop down any more trees.
translation.ko: 그래, 했지 난 나무를 안 베기로 했고

translation.en: And I said I was going to keep an eye on you.
translation.ko: 그래, 했지 난 나무를 안 베기로 했고 난 널 감시하기로 했지

translation.en: I'm starving. What's for breakfast?
translation.ko: 난 널 감시하기로 했지 배고프네! 아침은 뭐야?

translation.en: Breakfast is overrated.
(GRUNTS)
You know what? I got work to do. Yeah.
translation.ko: 난 오늘 할 일이 아주 많아

translation.en: I got to go into town and sell my Thneed.
translation.ko: 난 오늘 할 일이 아주 많아 도시에 가서 내 스니드를 팔아야 된다고

translation.en: (LAUGHS)
translation.ko: 도시에 가서 내 스니드를 팔아야 된다고

translation.en: to make that piece of garbage? Look at that...
translation.ko: 내 나무를 잘라 그 쓰레길 만들었나?

translation.en: "Garbage"? Oh, no. Oh, no! You do not get it.
translation.ko: 맙소사 쓰레기? 말도 안 돼 당신이 몰라서 그래

translation.en: This is a revolutionary product
translation.ko: 당신이 몰라서 그래 이건 혁신적인 물건이야 세상을 바꿀 제품이라고

translation.en: that will change the world as we know it. It has a million uses!
translation.ko: 이건 혁신적인 물건이야 세상을 바꿀 제품이라고

translation.en: Look at this. It's a swimsuit!
translation.ko: 쓰임새가 엄청 많아! 봐, 이건 수영복이야!

translation.en: Mud tracked all over your floor by uninvited guests?
translation.ko: 봐, 이건 수영복이야! 불청객들이 마루를 더럽혔을 땐?

translation.en: Well, the Thneed sure comes in handy for that!
translation.ko: 불청객들이 마루를 더럽혔을 땐? 스니드로 닦으면 말끔히 없어져

translation.en: Thanks to its all-natural microfibers,
the Thneed is super-absorbent! It also works as a hat.
Go ahead, knock yourself out.
translation.ko: 물론 일단 짜야지 그래, 가서 실컷 팔아봐

translation.en: Good to know.
Well, fortunately, you are not the target market, weirdo.
translation.ko: 충고 고맙군 하지만 당신한텐 안 팔 거니까 걱정 마, 꼴통

translation.en: You're bringing a guitar?
translation.ko: 하지만 당신한텐 안 팔 거니까 걱정 마, 꼴통

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I got a little jingle.
I'm gonna blow some minds, gonna sell some Thneeds!
translation.ko: 그래, 멋진 홍보로 사람들에게 스니드를 왕창 팔 거야!

translation.en: Yeah.
(SINGING) Everybody needs a Thneed
A fine thing that all people...
translation.ko: 누구나 스니드가 필요하죠 모두가 원하는 멋진…

translation.en: MAN: Sit down, go on.
Unfortunately, I didn't sell it the first day.
The Thneed is good
translation.ko: 불행히도 첫날엔 못 팔았지 스니드는 멋져

translation.en: The Thneed is great...
Hey!
Hey!
Or the third, or fourth, or fifth day.
Okay, that one hit the tender spot.
translation.ko: 셋째, 넷째, 다섯째 날도… 민감한 부위에 정통으로 맞았어

translation.en: Until finally...
That's it! You know what?
I'm done with this thing.
translation.ko: 그래, 좋아! 다 관둘 거야 때려치운다고!

translation.en: Aw.
My family was right. I quit!
Hey. Cool hat.
Oh, my gosh! I totally want one.
translation.ko: 이봐, 모자 멋진데? 세상에, 완전 갖고 싶다!

translation.en: That thing makes me like you more.
translation.ko: 세상에, 완전 갖고 싶다! 그걸 쓰니까 네가 더 좋아졌어

translation.en: (CHUCKLES)
Hey! Where's your Thneed, did you sell it?
Hey. No, no. Didn't sell it.
translation.ko: 이봐 스니드는 팔았어? 응? 아니 못 팔았어

translation.en: Turns out, it's ahead of its time, I guess.
Hey, you gave it your best shot. Right? What more can you do?
translation.ko: 넌 최선을 다했어 더 이상 어떻게 해?

translation.en: Come on, take a seat, we'll deal you in.
What are we playing?
I'm playing poker. He's playing Go Fish. And I think he's hungry.
translation.ko: 난 포커 얜 단어 게임 쟨 배고픈가 봐

translation.en: (SINGING) Pancake, the pancake
Up!
Who is up for ninths?
All right, pass them over.
Yeah, see? (RUMBLING)
What's going on?
Oh, no. That's a lot of people.
(SINGING) Everybody needs a Thneed
A fine thing that all people need
The Thneed is good The Thneed is great
Let's hope we're not too late
translation.ko: 우리가 너무 늦게 온 건 아니겠지

translation.en: It's a super trendy hat
It's a tightrope for an acrobat
A net for catching butterflies
A thing we use for exercise
Everybody needs a Thneed
A fine thing that all people need
Everybody needs a Thneed
Oh, yeah! We're in business, baby!
translation.ko: 우리 모두 스니드가 필요해 드디어 대박 터졌네!

translation.en: Mom? Hey, it's me! I told you I was going to be a success!
You need to bring the whole family here right now.
We're going to be rich!
What? I'm going to need all the help I can get. Don't worry.
translation.ko: 왜? 일손이 모자라서 그래 걱정하지 마

translation.en: GRAMMY: So, has he told you how to get a tree yet?
Actually, no.
But I think he's going to get to that part really soon.
translation.ko: 하지만 곧 그 얘길 해줄 거예요

translation.en: Here we are. What?
I'll just be a minute.
Oh, wow. Hey, Audrey!
Oh, hi, Ted! What's up?
You know me, just cruising. Putting out the vibe. Just me and my thoughts.
translation.ko: 나 원래 잘 싸돌아 다니잖아 이런저런 생각에 잠겨서…

translation.en: Oh, is this the girl you're always talking about?
Grandma! Stop making things up.
She's even prettier than... Okay, got to run! Bye.
Okay, Grammy, let's get you home!
I'm so sorry. So sorry.
Did not wanna see that. Whoa!
Hey, I'm back.
What have you got there?
Yes!
Thank you, Ted.
Now, picture this.
Sun shining, a blue sky, a perfect day.
translation.ko: 태양이 빛나는 푸른 하늘… 완벽한 날이었지

translation.en: It was all downhill from there.
What a dump.
Hey, Aunt Grizelda!
Hey, Chet, check this out!
Go long!
No, Brett, that's actually not a...
Go long! Go long!
I got it! I got it!
Got it!
He totally ran into that tree!
Oncie, is that you?
Mom!
There he is! There's my big, suddenly successful son!
translation.ko: 우리 아들 맞구나! 갑자기 성공한 내 아들이 맞아

translation.en: We always knew you would make it, Oncie. Right?
translation.ko: 우린 네가 성공할 줄 알았어 그렇지?

translation.en: Hey! I love this guy!
But you always said I wouldn't amount to anything, remember?
Hush your mouth. I was just trying to motivate you!
I am really glad that you clarified that
because it actually hurt my feelings for a really long time.
translation.ko: 실은 나 오랫동안 상처받았거든요 어쨌든 날 도와주러 왔으니 고마워요

translation.en: Anyway, you're all here, you all work for me, and that's cool.
So, let's get to work.
Brett, Chet, set up the RV!
Would you stop throwing that bear?
(PROTESTING)
translation.ko: 안 돼, 안 돼! 잠깐 정지! 동작 그만!

translation.en: Time out. Back up. Stop. Don't move an inch. Nobody's moving in here.
translation.ko: 잠깐 정지! 동작 그만! 여기서 살 수 없소

translation.en: You got to go. Goodbye.
So, who invited the giant, furry peanut?
You calling me a peanut, huh? I'll go right up your nose!
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
You wouldn't hit a woman.
That's a woman?
Okay. Everyone, cool it.
Let's not get off on the wrong foot here.
translation.ko: 처음부터 이러면 안 되죠 - 여긴 내 친구인… - 아는 사이지

translation.en: Um, family, this is my friend... Acquaintance.
translation.ko: - 여긴 내 친구인… - 아는 사이지 네, 아는 사이죠 잘 아는 사이 로렉스예요

translation.en: Yeah, acquaintance. Very good acquaintance, the Lorax.
translation.ko: 네, 아는 사이죠 잘 아는 사이 로렉스예요

translation.en: He speaks for the trees. That's right.
And on behalf of the trees, get out!
Will you just be nice! This is my family.
And I'm going to need their help if my company is going to get bigger. Okay?
Bigger?
Yeah, this isn't some rinky-dink operation anymore.
I got plans. Big plans!
translation.ko: 난 계획이 있어 큰 계획이! 온 세상을 스니드로 채울 거라고

translation.en: A vision of a world filled with Thneeds. It's going to be huge!
translation.ko: 온 세상을 스니드로 채울 거라고 난 성공할 거야!

translation.en: Which way does a tree fall?
Uh, down?
A tree falls the way it leans.
Be careful which way you lean.
I mean, look at this. It's amazing.
I am so proud of me.
Oncie, we've got us a little problem.
Problem?
See, we're not making Thneeds fast enough.
Harvesting the tufts takes too long!
translation.ko: 잎을 따는 시간이 너무 오래 걸려!

translation.en: Well, what else can we do?
Well, and this just came to me,
we could always start chopping down the trees.
What?
Now you're thinking. That would speed things up!
But... No "but"s, Oncie.
You're running a business now.
You have to do what's best for the company, and your momma.
translation.ko: 회사와 엄마를 위해 최선을 다해야 돼

translation.en: Well, I guess it couldn't hurt to chop down a few trees.
translation.ko: 나무 몇 그루쯤 자르는 거야 괜찮겠죠

translation.en: You've made me so proud, Oncie. Come here!
Hey! I love this guy!
No! No, no, no! Stop it! Please, stop.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 안 돼, 안 돼! 그러지 마, 안 돼!

translation.en: Take that, you stupid tree!
Where do you think you're going?
Excuse me, sir. I need to talk with your boss.
translation.ko: 실례해요, 할배 당신네 사장과 할 말이 있소

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry,
but Mr. Once-ler's not seeing anyone right now.
translation.ko: 원슬러 씨는 지금 아무도 못 만나

translation.en: Yeah, well, he'll see me. So...
Hey, keep your paws off me!
Give me a reason, Shorty.
Hey, you broke your promise.
You're better than this.
You gotta stop! This is bad!
Have a nice day!
Bad?
I'm not bad, I'm the good guy here. He just doesn't get it.
translation.ko: 난 좋은 사람이야 로렉스가 몰라서 그래

translation.en: Do you think I'm bad? (QUACKS)
Thank you!
I mean, something good finally happens to me,
and he just has to come along and rain on my parade.
What's his problem?
See?
Yeah, bad! Right.
(SINGING) How bad can I be?
I'm just doin' what comes naturally
How bad can I be?
I'm just following my destiny
How bad can I be?
I'm just doin' what comes naturally
How bad can I be?
How bad can I possibly be?
Well, there's a principle in nature Principle in nature
That almost every creature knows
Called survival of the fittest Survival of the fittest
And check it, this is how it goes
translation.ko: 그건 자연의 섭리 강한 자는 약한 자를 물고 뜯고 할퀴고 짓밟지

translation.en: The animal that wins gotta scratch and fight
translation.ko: 강한 자는 약한 자를 물고 뜯고 할퀴고 짓밟지

translation.en: And claw and bite and punch
translation.ko: 강한 자는 약한 자를 물고 뜯고 할퀴고 짓밟지 힘없고 약한 자는 약한 자는…

translation.en: And the animal that doesn't Well, the animal that doesn't
Winds up someone else's La-la-la-la lunch
Munch, munch, munch, munch, munch I'm just sayin'
How bad can I be?
I'm just doin' what comes naturally
How bad can I be?
I'm just following my destiny
How bad can I be?
translation.ko: 내가 대체 뭐가 나빠? 난 순리대로 할 뿐

translation.en: I'm just doin' what comes naturally
How bad can I be?
How bad can I possibly be?
There's a principle in business Principle in business
That everybody knows is sound
translation.ko: 모두가 아는 원칙 - 돈을 가진 자가 - 돈을 가진 자가

translation.en: It says the people with the money People with the money
translation.ko: - 돈을 가진 자가 - 돈을 가진 자가 세상을 움직이는 법

translation.en: Make this ever-loving world go round
translation.ko: 세상을 움직이는 법 난 회사도 공장도 키울 거야

translation.en: So I'm biggering my company I'm biggering my factory
I'm biggering my corporate sign
Bigger, bigger!
translation.ko: - 간판도 더 크게! - 크게! 남의 인생은 난 몰라

translation.en: Everybody out there You take care of yours
I'll take care of mine-mine-mine-mine-mine
translation.ko: 난 내 거만 챙기며 살 거야 내 거, 내 거, 내 거

translation.en: Shake that bottom line
Let me hear you say Smogulous Smoke! Smogulous Smoke!
translation.ko: - 다 함께, 시커먼 공해! - 시커먼 공해!

translation.en: Schloppity-Schlopp!
Schloppity-Schlopp!
translation.ko: - 썩은 폐수, 구정물 - 폐수, 구정물! 아무리 막아도 우린 절대 멈추지 않아

translation.en: Complain all you want It's never, ever, ever, ever gonna stop
translation.ko: 아무리 막아도 우린 절대 멈추지 않아

translation.en: Stop!
Come on, how bad can I possibly be?
How bad can I be?
I'm just building the economy
How bad can I be?
translation.ko: 내가 대체 뭐가 나빠? 곰돌이도 이렇게 예뻐하는데

translation.en: Just look at me petting this puppy
How bad can I be?
translation.ko: 뭐가 나쁘다는 거야? 조금은 자선도 베푸는데!

translation.en: A portion of proceeds goes to charity
How bad can I be?
translation.ko: 내가 대체 뭐가 나빠? 대체 내가 뭐가 나빠?

translation.en: How bad could I possibly be? Let's see!
All the customers are buying
And the money's multiplying
And the PR people are lying
And the lawyers are denying
Who cares if a few trees are dying?
This is all so gratifying!
How bad?
How bad can this possibly be?
So, how are things?
What are you doing here?
Happy yet? You fill that hole deep down inside you?
Or do you still need more?
translation.ko: 아니면 아직도 부족해? 그렇게 내 사업이 못마땅하면

translation.en: Look, if you've got a problem with what I'm doing,
translation.ko: 그렇게 내 사업이 못마땅하면 왜 당신의 그 잘난 마법으로 날 막지 않았지?

translation.en: why haven't you used your quote-unquote powers to stop me?
translation.ko: 왜 당신의 그 잘난 마법으로 날 막지 않았지?

translation.en: I told you, that's not how it works.
Right, I forgot. You're a fraud.
I need you to get out. Now!
Why? Do I make you uncomfortable?
Remind you of the promises you made?
The man you used to be?
You know what?
translation.ko: 잘 들어 난 조금도 양심에 거리끼는 거 없어

translation.en: You can just shut your mustache. My conscience is clear.
translation.ko: 난 조금도 양심에 거리끼는 거 없어

translation.en: I have done nothing illegal.
translation.ko: 법을 어긴 게 없거든 난 당당해 계속 성장하고

translation.en: I have my rights, and I intend to keep on biggering
translation.ko: 난 당당해 계속 성장하고 더 많은 나무를 스니드로 만들 거야

translation.en: and biggering, and turning more Truffula trees into Thneeds.
translation.ko: 더 많은 나무를 스니드로 만들 거야

translation.en: And nothing is going to stop me!
translation.ko: 그 어떤 것도 날 막지 못해!

translation.en: THE LORAX: Well, that's it.
The very last one.
That may stop you.
Somebody sure made a bundle on that thing.
translation.ko: 저걸로 누군가 떼부자가 됐지 이젠 또 어떤 대박 발명품이 나올까?

translation.en: I wonder what the next million dollar invention's going to be.
translation.ko: 이젠 또 어떤 대박 발명품이 나올까?

translation.en: Yeah, I wonder...
Son, you have let me down.
Brett, you are now my favorite child.
Hey, look, I don't want any trouble.
translation.ko: 난 너희와 싸우기 싫어 걱정 마, 얘들은 너와 싸울 생각 없어

translation.en: And you won't get any. Not from them.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 얘들은 너와 싸울 생각 없어

translation.en: Thanks to you and your hacking, and smogging and glupping,
they can't live here anymore.
So, I'm sending them off.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 떠나랬어 어딘가에 살 만한 곳을 찾아야 될 텐데…

translation.en: Hopefully, they'll be able to find a better place out there somewhere.
translation.ko: 어딘가에 살 만한 곳을 찾아야 될 텐데…

translation.en: Melvin?
Melvin...
Hey, Pipsqueak...
So, this is really all your fault.
You destroyed everything.
Yes.
And each day since the Lorax left,
translation.ko: 로렉스가 떠난 후 매일 난 여기 앉아 모든 걸 후회했지

translation.en: I've sat here regretting everything I've done,
translation.ko: 난 여기 앉아 모든 걸 후회했지

translation.en: staring at that word, "unless,"
and wondering what it meant.
But now I'm thinking...
translation.ko: 이제 알 거 같아 로렉스가 저 말을 남긴 건 너 때문이었나 봐

translation.en: Well, maybe you're the reason the Lorax left that word there.
translation.ko: 로렉스가 저 말을 남긴 건 너 때문이었나 봐

translation.en: Me? Why would he leave that for me?
translation.ko: 나요? 그게 무슨 소리예요? 너 같은 누군가가 관심을 갖지 않으면

translation.en: Because unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot,
translation.ko: 너 같은 누군가가 관심을 갖지 않으면 세상은 달라지지 않으니까…

translation.en: nothing is going to get better.
It's not.
The last Truffula seed.
You need to plant it, Ted.
translation.ko: 네가 그걸 심어야 돼 이젠 아무도 나무에 관심이 없는데요?

translation.en: Yeah, but, nobody cares about trees anymore.
Then make them care.
translation.ko: 관심을 갖게 해 도시 한가운데에 심어 모두가 보게…

translation.en: Plant the seed in the middle of town, where everyone can see.
Change the way things are.
translation.ko: 세상을 바꿔보라고 그건 하찮은 씨지만 중요한 건 그 씨가 아니라

translation.en: I know it may seem small and insignificant,
translation.ko: 그건 하찮은 씨지만 중요한 건 그 씨가 아니라

translation.en: but it's not about what it is,
translation.ko: 그건 하찮은 씨지만 중요한 건 그 씨가 아니라 그게 무엇이 되느냐야

translation.en: it's about what it can become.
translation.ko: 그게 무엇이 되느냐야 그건 평범한 씨가 아니야

translation.en: That's not just a seed,
any more than you're just a boy.
I won't let you down.
I know.
(MEOWING)
Hey, Audrey!
Audrey!
Ted?
What are you doing? Meet me at my house.
Wait, but...
My house, okay?
Got to plant the seed.
translation.ko: 씨를 심어야 돼 그래, 물이 필요할 거야

translation.en: Okay, we're going to need water.
translation.ko: 그래, 물이 필요할 거야 땅을 팔 연장도…

translation.en: And uh, something to dig with.
translation.ko: 땅을 팔 연장도… - 그리고 또… - 테드?

translation.en: Um, what do I have... Ted?
translation.ko: - 그리고 또… - 테드? 엄마, 나 바빠요

translation.en: Mom, I'm busy, Mom.
translation.ko: 엄마, 나 바빠요 시어도어 위긴스, 당장 내려와 농담 아냐!

translation.en: Theodore Wiggins, get down here right now, and I am not kidding with you!
translation.ko: 시어도어 위긴스, 당장 내려와 농담 아냐!

translation.en: Ted, I would like you to meet Mr. O'Hare,
translation.ko: 테드, 인사드려 오헤어 씨다 이 도시 최고의 권력자!

translation.en: the most powerful man in town.
There he is!
Hello, Ted.
Uh...
Hi. Isn't he clever, Mr. O'Hare?
translation.ko: 애가 똑똑하죠, 오헤어 씨? 자기 이름도 알아요

translation.en: He knows his own name and everything.
You know what I would love right now, Mrs. Wiggins?
translation.ko: 지금 제가 뭘 먹고 싶은지 아세요, 부인? 맛있는 쿠키요

translation.en: A delicious cookie.
Wonderful.
Teddy and I'll stay here and talk.
translation.ko: 테드와 얘기 좀 할게요 아예 얠 입양하시면 어때요?

translation.en: Sure, why don't you go ahead and adopt him?
translation.ko: 아예 얠 입양하시면 어때요? 농담이에요, 농담

translation.en: I'm just kidding. That was a joke. I was just joking.
I'll get your cookie.
(LAUGHS)
I know you have it, Ted.
translation.ko: 그걸 갖고 있는 거 알아 이런 웃기는 짓 그만하자

translation.en: So, let's put an end to this nonsense, shall we?
Hand it over.
I'm sorry...
I don't know what you're talking about.
Really? Well, then...
I guess you wouldn't mind us checking your room.
No, no, no!
Morty! McGurk! Find the seed!
No, you can't go up there!
Guys, this is ridiculous. Stop!
Hey!
No, you can't come in my room!
Find it!
Find it!
What is going on here?
This doesn't involve you! Get back downstairs!
translation.ko: 당신은 알 거 없어! 아래층으로 내려가

translation.en: Excuse me, down there! I don't care who you are, you little crazy baby-man!
translation.ko: 난 당신 하나도 겁 안 나 이 꼬맹이 땅딸보야!

translation.en: Get out of my house now. This is outrageous.
translation.ko: 내 집에서 썩 나가 이게 무슨 행패야?

translation.en: Fine. Sorry.
Must have been a misunderstanding. We'll be leaving now.
And my apologies, Ted.
You be safe.
Mind telling me what's going on here?
The seed! Where is it?
Seed?
Where's Grammy?
It's alive!
I remember you.
Ted, what...
Audrey!
Hey, did you want to... Well, okay!
Ted, what is this about?
It's about this.
Wait, wait, wait.
Is that... Yes. The last Truffula seed.
And you're going to help me plant it right in the middle of town where everyone can see it.
translation.ko: 이걸 모두가 보게 도시 한가운데 심게 도와줘

translation.en: I could just kiss you right now!
We don't have time for that.
I don't know, we have a little time.
But, you know what, let's just go. Let's go. Forget about it.
Maniac! Hey!
Here it comes!
I'm going for it.
Oh, hello!
Ted, big scary blimp coming.
You won't get away with this, boy!
Bam!
Go faster, you idiot!
Step on it, Ted!
You're fired!
Whoa! Ted, look out!
Nobody beats Aloysius O... Ted...
translation.ko: - 아무도 이 오헤어를 이길 순… - 테드…

translation.en: This is not good.
How's it doing?
Loser!
Oh, really?
Oh, no. The seed!
Get that seed!
Hang on! Here we go!
Grammy!
Seriously, how cool is your grandma?
No!
Come on!
There it is!
Hey! Watch the road, you meathead!
translation.ko: 야, 잘 보고 달려 이 멍청아!

translation.en: Oh, come on!
What the...
Get it unstuck, get it unstuck!
Bring it on, Teddy!
You don't have the guts!
Ted!
Grammy!
Whoo-hoo! Yes!
Hey, hey, hey!
Hey! It's Mr. O...
Take that, shorty!
Okay, we have to get this in the ground.
But where? There's no dirt anywhere.
No, Grammy...
MAN: Hey, get out of there!
See, what did I tell you? Easy. Huh?
Hey, they broke O'Hare's head!
WOMAN: What do you think you're doing, kid?
Um, I'm looking for a place to plant a tree.
A real one.
Why would we need a tree?
Exactly.
Oh, man.
Folks...
The last thing you want around here is trees.
translation.ko: 우리한테 가장 필요 없는 게 나무입니다

translation.en: They're filthy!
Spewing that sticky, nasty sap all over the place.
They bring poisonous ants and stinging bees.
Hey! Ouch. Think about the kids.
And, I just thought, you know, they make leaves!
You know that, right?
Then these leaves, they just fall. They just fall wherever they want!
translation.ko: 그 잎이 막 떨어진다고요! 아무 데나 막!

translation.en: Come on! We know why you're really against trees. Because they produce fresh air.
translation.ko: 나무를 싫어하는 진짜 이유는 나무가 공기를 만들기 때문이죠?

translation.en: For free!
I am wounded! You have lied!
It is not a lie! It's called photosynthesis.
Come on. She's making that up!
That's a made-up word, people!
Thneedville is perfect just the way it is.
We don't need trees!
That boy has a seed.
We need to stop him! Who's with me? Come on!
translation.ko: 쟬 막아야 돼요! 날 따를 사람?

translation.en: O'Hare is right!
Seeds will ruin us all! Stop it!
Last chance, kid. Hand it over!
Where do you think you're going?
Come on, let's go!
Get in, get in!
Stop that maniac!
Excuse me, excuse me. Watch out!
Ted, you're going to hit the wall!
Yeah. I know.
Wow. Did you see that?
Who does this kid think he is, huh?
I am Ted Wiggins.
And I speak for the trees.
And the fact is, things aren't perfect here in Thneedville.
And they're only going to get worse, unless we do something about it,
translation.ko: 뭔가 하지 않으면 더 나빠질 거예요

translation.en: unless we change our ways.
And we can start by planting this! (ALL EXCLAIMING)
translation.ko: 그 첫 출발은 바로 이걸 심는 거죠!

translation.en: Okay. Come on, now. Everything is fine.
Right?
I say we tell this kid what we think about that seed!
translation.ko: 씨앗이 필요 없다는 걸 쟤한테 보여줍시다!

translation.en: People, come on!
You! Get out there right now
and get these people on my side, or else you're fired!
translation.ko: 사람들 좀 설득해봐 안 그러면 해고야!

translation.en: Go on, tell them what you think.
(SINGING) You don't know me, but my name's Cy
translation.ko: 여러분은 날 몰라도 내 이름은 싸이

translation.en: I'm just the O'Hare delivery guy
But it seems like trees might be worth a try
translation.ko: 나무를 심는 건 해볼 만한 일 같아요

translation.en: So I say let it grow
My name is Dan
And my name's Rose
Our son Wesley kind of glows
And that's not good, so we suppose
We should let it grow
Let it grow, let it grow
You can't reap what you don't sow
Plant a seed inside the Earth
Just one way to know its worth
Let's celebrate the world's rebirth
We say let it grow
My name's Marie, and I am three!
I would really like to see a tree
I say let it grow
translation.ko: 라, 라, 라, 라, 라, 리 나무를 키워봐요

translation.en: I'm Grammy Norma I'm old, and I've got gray hair
translation.ko: 난 노마 할매 머리 허연 할망구지만

translation.en: But I remember when trees were everywhere
And no one had to pay for air
So I say let it grow
Let it grow, let it grow
Like it did so long ago
It is just one tiny seed
But it's all we really need
It's time to change the life we lead
translation.ko: 이젠 우리의 삶을 바꿔야 할 때

translation.en: Time to let it grow
My name's O'Hare, I'm one of you
I live here in Thneedville, too
The things you say just might be true
It could be time to start anew
And maybe change my point of view
translation.ko: 내 생각도 바꿀 때가 된 걸까?

translation.en: Nah! I say let it die!
Let it die, let it die
Let it shrivel up and... Come on, who's with me?
translation.ko: 시들어 죽어버리게… 자, 함께 부를 사람?

translation.en: Nobody.
You greedy dirt-bag!
Let it grow, let it grow
translation.ko: 당신은 못된 욕심쟁이! 나무를 키우세, 키우세

translation.en: Let the love inside you show
Plant a seed inside the Earth
Just one way to know its worth
Let's celebrate the world's rebirth
We say let it grow
Let it grow, let it grow
You can't reap what you don't sow
It's just one tiny seed
But it's all we really need
It's time to banish all your greed
Imagine Thneedville flowered and treed
Let this be our solemn creed
Thank you, Ted.
We say let it grow
In Thneedville
We say let it grow
It's a brand new dawn We say let it grow
translation.ko: - 새 아침이 밝아오네 - 우리 모두 함께 가꿔나가요

translation.en: In Thneedville
We say let it grow
It's a brand new dawn
You done good, Beanpole.
You done good.
By the way, nice mustache.
